caption.p: Annual mean simulated SST in (a) N216ORCA025 and (b) N96ORCA1 and the bias against ESA CCI satellite observations for (c) N216ORCA025 and (d) N96ORCA1. Temperature scale in degrees Celsius. Average over year 50 to 100 of the simulations. RMSE = root‐mean‐square error of the simulated field against the observations; SST = sea surface temperature.
